Key Match Events: Bhuvneshwar Kumar took 4 wickets for 13 runs
Dinesh Karthik hit two sixes in the last over to score 30 runs
Post-Match Reflections: Stand-in captain Rishabh Pant was criticized for not bowling out Bhuvneshwar Kumar early
Miscellaneous Highlights: Avesh Khan and Harshal Patel did not finish their quota of overs
India's questionable bowling strategy was criticized
The match was played in humid conditions
